zh_cn.welcome_text:
欢迎你，{location} 场 {faction} 签到人员。

/importrsvp - 导入你所在阵营的特工
/checkin - 进行签到
/checkout - 进行签退
/help - 寻求帮助

en_us.welcome_text:
Hello. You are {faction} organizer of {location} First Saturday.

/importrsvp - Import the list of agents same as the faction you are managing
/checkin - Check in an agent
/checkout - Check out an agent
/help - I need help
